Klasse ShowBewerbungView

java.lang.Object
com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout>
com.spirit.application.views.profile.Unternehmen.ShowBewerbungView
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
com.vaadin.flow.component.AttachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.DetachNotifier, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasElement, com.vaadin.flow.component.HasStyle, com.vaadin.flow.router.AfterNavigationObserver, com.vaadin.flow.router.internal.AfterNavigationHandler, Serializable
@Route(value="unternehmen/show/bewerbung", layout=AppView.class) @RolesAllowed("unternehmen") public class ShowBewerbungView extends com.vaadin.flow.component.Composite<com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout> implements com.vaadin.flow.router.AfterNavigationObserver
View for displaying applications submitted for the job posts of the currently logged-in company. This view is accessible only to users with the "UNTERNEHMEN" role.
Siehe auch:

  • Konstruktordetails

    • ShowBewerbungView

      public ShowBewerbungView(MarkdownConverter markdownConverter, BewerbungService bewerbungService, SessionService sessionService, JobPostService jobPostService)
      Constructs the `ShowBewerbungView` with the required services and initializes the layout.
      Parameter:
      markdownConverter - Service for converting Markdown to HTML.
      bewerbungService - Service for managing applications.
      sessionService - Service for managing user session data.
      jobPostService - Service for managing job posts.

  • Methodendetails

    • studentCard

      public com.vaadin.flow.component.orderedlayout.VerticalLayout studentCard(BewerbungDTO bewerbung, JobPostDTO jobPost)
      Creates a card layout for displaying information about a student and their application.
      Parameter:
      bewerbung - The `BewerbungDTO` representing the student's application.
      jobPost - The `JobPostDTO` representing the job post for which the application was submitted.
      Gibt zurück:
      A `VerticalLayout` containing the student card.

    • afterNavigation

      public void afterNavigation(com.vaadin.flow.router.AfterNavigationEvent event)
      Triggered after navigation to this view, loads and displays applications for all job posts created by the currently logged-in company.
      Angegeben von:
      afterNavigation in Schnittstelle com.vaadin.flow.router.internal.AfterNavigationHandler
      Parameter:
      event - The navigation event triggering this method.
